title: Drawing, "Seascapes, Newfoundland, July 6, 1859", 1859
medium: Graphite, white gouache on light brown paper
inscribed: Top right:"2's". "2 Low toned compared with sun / soft yellowish warm glow / water Blue contrasting strongly / with sky horizon softened with water" / date
description: The sea reflects the sun which is in a cloudy sky

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Seascapes, Newfoundland, July 6, 1859", 1859.
1859. Graphite, white gouache on light brown paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-274-a.
